subject: Basketball (College)
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: Testifying at a closely followed antitrust trial, Jim Delany, the commissioner of the Big Ten, said the business of college sports places undue demands on college athletes.
snippet: Testifying at a closely followed antitrust trial, Jim Delany, the commissioner of the Big Ten, said the business of college sports places undue demands on college athletes.
